Question: This person had a substantial library in his home.
Hints: The anecdote that this person often remarked, "Philadelphia, wonderful town, spent a week there one night" is unsubstantiated.
This person was cremated and his ashes interred in the Forest Lawn Memorial Park Cemetery, in Glendale, California.
The Sloper character may in turn have been inspired by Dickens's Mr Micawber, whom this person later played on film.
